sqlMap.select: SELECT count(A.BIN_PromotionActivityID) AS count FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT max(B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID) AS promotionActivityRuleID FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A , Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID

SELECT A.ActivityName AS prmActiveName, A.ActivityCode AS activityCode, A.DescriptionDtl AS descriptionDtl, A.ActivityType AS activityType, A.Times AS maxReceiveQty, A.ChangeableFlag AS mainModify, A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID AS actGrpID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(30),A.UpdateTime,121) AS updTime, A.ModifyCount AS modCount, B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AS ruleID, B.RuleDetail AS ruleHTML, A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, A.ActivitySetBy AS activitySetBy, A.TemplateFlag AS templateFlag FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A , Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = A.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND B.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BasePropValue1 AS basePropValue1, A.BasePropValue2 AS basePropValue2, A.ConditionGrpID AS grpID, A.ActLocationType AS actLocationType FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition A, Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B, Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity C WHERE C.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND C.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND A.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID
A.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_ID#
A.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #basePropIdList[]#
AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY A.ConditionGrpID

SELECT CASE WHEN E.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID IS NOT NULL THEN E.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID ELSE F.BIN_ProductVendorID END AS proId, A.SaleType AS saleType, CASE WHEN E.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID IS NOT NULL THEN C.ValidFlag + E.ValidFlag ELSE D.ValidFlag + F.ValidFlag END AS validFlag, A.PromotionPrtCode AS barCode, A.PromotionPrtUnitcode AS unitCode, A.Price AS price, A.Quantity AS quantity, A.OldPrice AS oldPrice, A.GroupType AS groupType, C.ExPoint AS exPoint, CASE WHEN C.BIN_PromotionProductID IS NULL THEN 'CPCX' ELSE C.PromotionCateCD END AS prmCate
,CASE WHEN C.BIN_PromotionProductID IS NOT NULL THEN C.NameForeign ELSE D.NameForeign END AS nameTotal
,CASE WHEN C.BIN_PromotionProductID IS NOT NULL THEN C.NameTotal ELSE D.NameTotal END AS nameTotal
,CASE WHEN C.BIN_PromotionProductID IS NOT NULL THEN C.NameTotal ELSE D.NameTotal END AS nameTotal
FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B ON(A.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct C ON(C.UnitCode = A.PromotionPrtUnitcode) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor E ON(C.BIN_PromotionProductID = E.BIN_PromotionProductID AND A.PromotionPrtCode = E.BarCode) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Product D ON(D.UnitCode = A.PromotionPrtUnitcode) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor F ON(D.BIN_ProductID = F.BIN_ProductID AND A.PromotionPrtCode = F.BarCode) WHERE B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#

SELECT B.BIN_RegionID AS cityID, D.BIN_ChannelID AS channelID FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo AS C left JOIN Basis.BIN_Region AS A JOIN Basis.BIN_Region AS B ON A.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(B.NodeID) = 1 AND (B.RegionType = '2' OR B.RegionType = '3') AND B.ValidFlag = '1' ON C.BIN_RegionID = A.BIN_RegionID AND A.ValidFlag = '1' left JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel AS D ON C.BIN_ChannelID = D.BIN_ChannelID AND D.ValidFlag = '1', Basis.BIN_Organization oz WHERE C.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.BIN_OrganizationID = C.BIN_OrganizationID AND oz.ValidFlag = '1' AND ( oz.DepartName Like '%' + #counterName# + '%' OR oz.NameForeign Like '%' + #counterName# + '%' )

UPdATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity SET BIN_PromotionActGrpID = convert (INT,#prmActGrp#), ActivityName = #prmActiveName#, DescriptionDtl = #descriptionDtl#, Times = convert (INT,#maxReceiveQty#), ChangeableFlag = #mainModify#, ActivitySetBy = #userID#, ActivityType = #activityType#, NeedBuyFlag = #needBuyFlag#,
Status = #status#,
SendFlag = #sendFlag#,
WHERE BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND UpdateTime = #updTime# AND ModifyCount = #modCount#

UPDATE Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis SET ActivityFromDate = #actStartTime# + ' 00:00:00', ActivityToDate=#actEndTime# + ' 23:59:59' where MainCode = #activityCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID =#brandInfoId# AND ValidFlag = '1'

UPdATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity SET ValidFlag = '0' WHERE BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
UPDATE A SET A.ValidFlag = '0' FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity B on(A.RuleCode = B.ActivityCode and A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
UPDATE A SET A.ValidFlag = '0' FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity B on(A.CampaignCode = 'AS' + B.ActivityCode and A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#

UPdATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity SET sendFlag = '2' WHERE BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
UPDATE C SET C.BasePropValue2 = CONVERT(VARCHAR,GetDate(),120) FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition C ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionBaseProp D ON(C.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = D.BIN_PromotionBasePropID AND D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_time') WHERE B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
UPDATE A SET A.EndTime = GETDATE() FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity B on(A.RuleCode = B.ActivityCode and A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity B ON(A.MainCode = B.ActivityCode AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#

UPDATE B SET B.ValidFlag = '0', B.State = '2' FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B ON(A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID AND 'AS' + A.ActivityCode = B.CampaignCode AND A.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
